website_summaries.verdict: A diligent automatic suction cleaner that utilizes dual scrubbing brushes to dislodge dirt for a more thorough cleaning.
pros: This pool cleaner is designed for inground pools up to 50 feet
It features a tangle-free line, ballasts for helping clean the walls and waterline, and an LED light that indicates when the unit is full
Additionally, the device has a weekly scheduler so you can decide how often it cleans
cons: This is a pricier option that may not fit comfortably in everyone's budget

customer_reviews.title: I hate it! Don't but it
customer_reviews.text: I hate it not 3 months into owning it and it craps out. No one around says they service this model even though they are all "authorized Dolphin Dealers" bull they only service if you bought from them! Maytronics website is crap! you go to customer service and they ask do you want to become a dealer, no I want info on how to get it fixed! What a great warranty, if anyone from Maytronics reads this you can contact me to discuss
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Do not expect help if you have a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Unit did not perform as advertised. It did not climb pool walls well like shown in the video. It left large areas of the pool floor untouched. Very little owner information in box. Contacted manufacturer who did not provide any help and suggested I contact seller. Left request for seller assistance on Amazon with no response. Contacted seller who took all my information and promised a call back but they never did. Unit is advertised as a new module but it appears to be the same module as sold a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sirna

customer_reviews.title: Customer service LACKS...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit from Amazon from Pool Express Group in March 2018. It came on its daily setting the Friday before memorial day and smoke started coming out of the control box and it quit working. I have called pool express 3 days in a row, 1st day I was told the person I need to talk to had stepped out but she would have them call me when they returned. Next 2 days I was told the person I need to talk to was on the phone with another customer but would call me shortly... Still haven't received a call. Their customer service LACKS!!! Their website states they are the only "authorized dealer".
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: If you truly want a great pool cleaner - this is it
customer_reviews.text: If you truly want a great pool cleaner - this is it. It does amazing work. Remember, 98% of algae and bacteria in your pool is on the sides, not the bottom. This product eliminates the back-braking chore of "brushing" the pool sides. Yes, it is expensive, but totally worth it's weight in gold!! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Support is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: My head unit stopped working right after a month. Support is the WORST. They make you write to them (no phone number) and I have tried three times with no reply. After tracking down a US headquarters number, I got a robot that put me on hold then told me nobody was available between 11 and 12:45 (long lunch). The cleaner worked ok when it worked, but nothing to write home to mommy about so I dont get why Amazon is all giddy about them.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis in CT

customer_reviews.title: Pool Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: It made one cycle, then after cleaning the bag it floated , I called Maytronics x 2, and they were very helpful, and attempted to walk me through troubleshooting. Amazon of course was great in allowing me to return the pool cleaner, but as much as it cost, I was afraid to risk having to go through this again, back to the board researching pool vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: dvrogers

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF LINER DAMAGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used to have a Dolphin Dynamic unit for 10 years - worked great (if a bit slow). The new unit seems like a big hit (fast, powerful, covers the entire 40x20ft pool). HOWEVER, within just 3 weeks the liner started showing signs of the pattern completely rubbing off. The unit gets stuck for a few minutes at time in the 45 degree corners and the new threads are apparently much harder and cause damage to the liner. So far the company has refused to respond (or lost the messages) - the web site form appears to go nowhere).
customer_reviews.author: P64

customer_reviews.title: Great at keeping our pool spotless
customer_reviews.text: We have had this cleaner about 3 weeks now and it has done a great job at getting dirt and debris off the bottom of the pool. I still am astonished by the amount of stuff it picks up. I put in the the pool about every other day. 1st with the leaf bag picking up most of the debris. Then another time with the filter and it makes the pool look like new. Great product recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Turner

customer_reviews.title: Better than we expected
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about spending this much money on a product I hadn't seen or tried, but we are very impressed. Our pool is very irregularly shaped, so it doesn't get to every curved corner and is challenged by our curved steps, but I don't think anything would work on our pool. It climbs the 8-foot walls just like it claims and picks up just about everything. We had algae for a while, and it helped with that. We had ash from a nearby forest fire and it did great with that. It picks up normal dirt and leaves. We use it once or multiple times per week and it is still going strong after almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WORST POOL VAC
customer_reviews.text: We had to replace the stingray pool vac that we had. The first we got kept cutting off, the company replaced it. This one, while it has a big "bag" for collection, it does not pick the small pieces that land on the bottom of the pool, we have to manually push them to the return so that it will be filtered out. This product is $$$$ given what it does and does not do. I wish I had my old stingray back.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great and climbs like a billy goat
customer_reviews.text: Our old dolphin died after 5 years. This one cleans much better and climbs to the top of the tile like a billy goat. This is a must have for all pool owners.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: Strong vacuum that is a great pool floor scrubbed.
customer_reviews.text: Great pool vacuum. It wasn’t too heavy and I liked how easy it was to clean. Make sure you store it upside down like the instructions say so that the rubber scrubbers and foam rollers don’t get damaged. Some reviews said it doesn’t climb but I saw it climb our walls quite a few times. I haven’t figured out if there is Bluetooth with it but it has helped clean our pool a lot. Our water is beyond cloudy and this vacuum is starting to help clear it up quite a bit. I think the value really comes in when cleaning it out. It’s so simple to clean and I feel that it really scrubs the floor well.
customer_reviews.author: ktimm3

customer_reviews.title: Not happy, doesn't clean corners
customer_reviews.text: The machine does a great job cleaning the floor of my inground pool but does a horrible job with the corners of the pool. Debris is usually left sitting in the corner for me to sweep out. Not happy with the product, expected to now have to worry about cleaning my pool since I spent over a thousand in the robot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fan motor (vacuum) won't stay running for more than 30 seconds and then shuts down.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new out of the box the unit won't stay running for more than 30 seconds at a time. Customer support sucked (888) 365-7446. NO INSTRUCTIONS INCLUDED OR ONLINE! Weekly scheduile does not work and/or no one knows how to set it up. Filed a claim with Amazon to return the unit 3 hours after I received it. I won't buy another Dolphin because they have no support at all... Worse than trying to get help from Microsoft... A unit of this compexity needs to have a support network in play and these guys DO NOT...
customer_reviews.author: Dana Bolin

customer_reviews.title: Better investment than an inline pool system in my scenario.
customer_reviews.text: I had an older Maytronics Premier model Premier model (Triton) . I got this one because it didn't make sense to replace the expensive motor assembly in an attempt to fix it. I chose this one because it has good 3 year warranty, plus I can interchange some of the parts with my previous model. I like some of the newer features available on this model as well as the simplicity of knowing what to expect. It made more sense for me to buy this model than setup an inline pool system. I have had it for a week, but I am already happy with what I got. Good quality materials that hopefully will last me another 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Daveedo

customer_reviews.title: A WELCOME ADDITION TO ANY  INGROUND POOL OWNER
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE VACUUM.HAD A POLARIS 380 BEFORE. LOVE HAVING A VACUUM NOT CONNECTED TO THE FILTER!!!! HOWEVER, THE HOSE DOES GET TWISTED EVEN THOUGH THERE IS A "SWIVEL FREE" FEATURE ON THE HOSE.IT IS HELPFUL,BUT NOT GOOD ENOUGH DOES A GREAT JOB CLEANING THE POOL AND THE FILTERS ARE EASY TO CLEAN.I WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Donna g Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I purchased this pool cleaner. It took about 8-10 recycles (with cleaning the cartridges in between each) before my pool was clean. Now I run it 2-3 times a week. When I first tried it, I was on pins and needles because this pool cleaner cost sooo much money. After watching to climb to wall and get the water line, I was relieved. One mistake I made was not cleaning the filter right after taking it out of the pool - DON'T DO THAT. I was able to clean with it with lots of extra effort. Sadly, I can only rate this a 5 star, it's a 10 in my book :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this pool cleaner on May 29, 2019, and the power source never worked from the start. We called Maytronics twice (each time on hold for more than 20 minutes), and spoke to two different people who requested the receipt and serial number (which we provided), then promised they would replace it. We've never heard from either again. At this point we will likely just box it up and send it back and never buy another Maytronics product.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Krowiak

customer_reviews.title: After 3 months, very happy with Dolphin Premier 2018
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time mulling over reviews of many different robotic vacuums. Ultimately decided on this, and couldn't be happier thus far (3 months of use). I was skeptical that this would make such a big impact, but after weeks of brushing my pool and seeing dirt move around prior to using the vacuum, I was pleasantly surprised the first time I brushed after using the robot for the first time. There was practically no visible debris moving around after a robot cleaning. I also like that I can schedule it for every other day for a week to run automatically.
customer_reviews.author: thephatp

customer_reviews.title: Great!! Had it for two months use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great!! Had it for two months use it every other day... Sometimes I think it's going to climb out of the pool and chase me!! I did notice in my experience, the BAG filter picks up more dirt than the snap-in cartridge type filters.
customer_reviews.author: BobB85364

customer_reviews.title: Power unit didn't power up
customer_reviews.text: Package came as expected but after removing the unit from the box and plugging in the power unit....the unit will not power up. Very upsetting that you buy a new product and the power unit will not even come on! Tried calling customer service but they only offer service monday through friday!. Not happy with this expensive purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Walters

customer_reviews.title: I love my dolphin and I would have given it 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my dolphin and I would have given it 5 stars a month ago but it broke after only 60 days. While it was under warranty, I still had to pay $57 to ship it back to a repair center Plus was out of a vacuum for about 1 week. Other than the swivel going bad I have had good experience with my dolphin. No sure why the swivel broke because I’m very careful and particular about the care of my dolphin.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Braden

customer_reviews.title: Warrenty
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent, but not perfect job. I was really impresses when I had to have power supply replaced under warrenty. Unit purchased in June 2016 and power supply stopped working in September 2018. There were a total of 5 emails and I have a new power supply. Their communications were all timely and helpful. They included a troublehooting attachment that will be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: CRI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with correct filter
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old tiger shark. It works very well, does a much better job of getting to the whole pool than the tiger shark did (it always avoided the shallow end). Big caveat: take out the "giant" bag which just clogs up almost immediately and replace with the included mesh filter. It works much much better this way; night and day difference. With the bag it could even climb the walls for to the added weight of its own filter. I was prepared to come here and leave a 1 star review until i realized the bag filter was the problem. Bad gimmick used to try and differentiate and sell the robot.
customer_reviews.author: raphe

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This is the most expensive pool cleaner on Amazon. I usually don't go for the most expensive anything. I read the reviews, and was convinced to take a chance. It is the best pool cleaner (by far) I have ever had. It gets all the dirt & debris, and climbs walls and stairs. The only negative is that cleaning the bag is like changing a wet dirty diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas, Baby

customer_reviews.title: Favorite purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: This pool vacuum is AMAZING!! We've had it for 3 years now and it is still running great! We have a 40x20 in ground pool that is 12' deep. We program the vacuum to run every day. It climbs the walls and will even try climbing the stairs. We have a drain in the deep end and it doesn't get stuck on the drain. It's very easy to clean the filters. It comes with a larger debris style bag and small sand style filters. We only use the sand style filters as we don't have any issue with leaves or other large debris. I can't give this product enough great reviews! It is my absolute favorite purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn K.

customer_reviews.title: A great choice for a really clean pool
customer_reviews.text: After researching robotic cleaners of every make for quite some time, I finally concluded this Dolphin Premier was the best bet even though it was one of the more expensive ones. After having used it for a few weeks I am very impressed with the performance and ease of operation. Using both sets of filters over time I have the cleanest pool I have ever had. The fine filter cleans all of the silt and algae and the larger filter keeps the pool clean of all debris and grit which blows into the pool. The filter system is easy to use and extremely effective. This is a very good investment for the pool and glad I made that choice.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Joe

customer_reviews.title: Dolphin Premier Robotic Cleaner DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: The Dolphin Premier Robotic Pool Cleaner worked for 2 months and stopped working. It has not worked since. I looked online and tried all the troubleshooting. Others have the same issue. I have been unable to get a response from Maytronics the manufacturer and the company that sold it through Amazon will not exchange it either. DO NOT BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: su

customer_reviews.title: Hard working machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It will save Me hours in pool maintenance. Before buying this, I spent hours in research. I reviewed independent reviewers, as well as consumer reviews. I finally settled on this one. Some said it wouldn't climb walls or stairs... Well it does. Ive attached pics of both. Very happy with this robot
customer_reviews.author: Wheeler21

customer_reviews.title: glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the pool cleaner , what a big difference . Pool has never been this clean before... glad I bought it . Plus I don't have to worry for 7 years because I bought the extra warranty . DON'T know why people say it doesn't climb the walls , because it climbs mine great
customer_reviews.author: Alejo Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: It cleans pretty well. But the hassle of maintaining and running this thing is totally not worth it. After a few weeks I finally just fixed my old pressure cleaner and tossed this thing in the shed. It is such a pain i.t.a. to clean, take out, and put in. And you cannot leave it out if there is any prospect of rain. Unless you live in the dessert and have very little debris getting in your pool (so you don't have to take out the bizarre filter system to clean) this is not for you. Pressure cleaners are much simpler and far less hands on. Huge, expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crane

customer_reviews.title: fantastic cleaning, very difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This product does a great job cleaning the pool, and would receive 5 stars for that. However, I give it only one star on ease of use. The intake to the bag has very small slots that plug up during every use. The bag is difficult to remove, clean, and replace making the daily maintenance task much more time consuming than with our old polaris. I am happy with the cleaning job it does, but would not buy it again due to the difficulty of use.
customer_reviews.author: Alan E Baker

customer_reviews.title: ... and decided to go with this company and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and decided to go with this company and I'm glad I did. I unboxed it read the directions and within 10 min this little guy was cleaning the pool. my pool has never been so clean. the filters were able to pick up sand and algae without any issues. thanks again
customer_reviews.author: A. Faunce

customer_reviews.title: They dont really give you enough time to try it out, before the return window closes.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how much it weighs. I don't like that the tracks keep popping off. I don't like that my 16 year old daughter can't lift it out of the water without scratching up the sides. I don't like that the bag fills up very quickly and I have to drag out the entire machine, take it apart, and dump it. I mostly don't like the amount of money I spent for such a difficult machine. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: J VON

customer_reviews.title: Great warranty and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this model 3 years ago and it's worked flawlessly since. The only trouble so far was the power supply unit that sits outside of the pool started acting goofy. Considering I left this electronic device out the entire winter in the northeast I'm surprised it even worked at all. Anyway, I called the company, spoke with a HUMAN about my issue and within less than 5 minutes they agreed to send a new power supply unit free of charge. I WILL BUY ANOTHER ONE IN THE FUTURE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the Dolphin Premier. We've been using it for a month. When we opened our pool this year, our cover had a couple holes, and a lot of trash had really dirtied the water. It had never been this bad...the pool bottom & walls were very dark & badly stained. In a couple of days, it had cleaned the bottom & walls and our water was clear. No hand scrubbing on walls was needed. It picks up very small particles and it's easy to clean the filters. It has trouble cleaning our steps, maybe because they're fiberglass. Still very happy
customer_reviews.author: D. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend this pool cleaner
customer_reviews.text: we recently purchased a home with an inground pool & have been through 2 other pool cleaners with no luck. they mostly just stirred everything up rather than actually sucked anything up. we purchased this pool cleaner & have zero complaints! the suction is great & cleaning afterwards when it is done is super easy. I like the fact the pool pump can still run since this is ran off of an outlet rather than the pool pump.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke T.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with customer Service and product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a dolphin premier brand new and owned it approximately one year but only used it for three months because our summer seasons are short. The brush ripped from the wheel while cleaning. That is not covered under the 3 year warranty. Michelle Brooks calls it a wearable part. So after waiting an hour on the phone on hold,Jabari was unable to assist and stated his supervisor Michelle Brooks will not cover it. After using it less than 12 times it breaks, I would not buy it again. I had a Hayward Shark for ten years and never had a problem. Dolphin premier is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Woj

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but does not climb walls
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good robot vacuum, but it does not climb the vinyl walls, stairs or get all of the pool in one run. It claims to have technology to efficiently cover all if the pool, but that is certainly not the case. However, the areas it does cover, it does them well. I have also experianced the vacuum dropping things back into the pool when being removed, but thats not a huge issue. Overall, good vacuum, but not the best considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one less than two years ago and am having several problems. This should be covered under warranty yet it has been impossible to speak with a customer service representative. I have contacted Maytronics online and have called several times only to be left on hold for 30+ minutes. I am less than pleased after having spent over $1,000 for this product. This is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Niemi

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Well, other performance is Meh
customer_reviews.text: Well, it does a nice job cleaning the pool. It walks about and scrubs and sucks so that's pretty good. This thing will NOT climb my pool walls however. It begins climbing the side and then just slips sideways and slides back to the bottom where it bumps against the wall for a bit before turning around and going the other way. It also seems to leak debris back into the pool when lifting it out of the water. I watched some videos online and the reviewers suggest jerking the robot out as quickly as possible so any leakage doesn't make it back into the pool, but I still leak a lot even doing that.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Extremely slow shipping
customer_reviews.text: This automatic pool cleaning robot works extremely well my pool has never been cleaner. Easy to use easy to clean. If you need it in a hurry do not buy it from Amazon it took them over five days to even process the order for shipping and then found the slowest way to ship it to me and Amazon wants to blame it on COVID-19 it’s just another way for Amazon to save money And continue to charge for their prime membership
customer_reviews.author: PickyMama

customer_reviews.title: rotating sweeper not touching pool surface
customer_reviews.text: This Dolphin model, the sweeper is not scrubbing the pool surface well. I suspect the 2 white foam that suppose to protect the sweeper, is too thick, thus on the foam is making the contact on the surface. See the result after 3 days of running the machine. I had older model and it worked excellent until the motor give up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have a sun deck!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this product. We have a few built in benches in our pool and sun deck. The dolphin seems to gravitate right to the sun deck every time, flips itself over and shuts down is the shallower water. I would NOT buy this if you have a sun deck.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Timberlake

customer_reviews.title: Only working "OK". Maybe due to careless packing for shipment?
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be working fairly well, though I see it occasionally passing over top of the smaller particles and not gathering them. Perhaps that's because it was delivered in a box that allowed it to sit on the little styrofoam wheels and the rubber brushes, deforming them all? Pics included from right after the unpacking. You would think that when you spend over $1,100 on a piece of equipment, it would be packed with a little more care for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that this pool cleaner works completely independently of my ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had this beast for close to 2 years now. Been performing superbly so far. The original screen micro filters are very thin and eventually failed. But the pleated filters are strong and durable. I love that this pool cleaner works completely independently of my pool filter system. I'll update later,,,
customer_reviews.author: nblinow

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Magnificent machine! However, it began to stall at about 1 year old. But then it seemed to self-correct. Than at two years old it required an external nudge to get going. At 30 months it required more nudges. At 3 years it operates for perhaps 5-10 minutes, then you have to nudge it again. Great machine...other than the reduced reliability with time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. 3 hours and pool is pristine. Will hardly ever have to use the pole/vacuum head through the skimmer again. Keeps debris out of the sand filter so I have not had to backwash all summer. I think it is well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Fails to function the day after Amazon's return period expires!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time, and most importantly your money, with this device. The day after Amazon's return period for this device it went dead! Tried to call the manufacturer and they have better hours of operations than most banks. You would be better off taking $1100 and burning it and using the ashes to help filter your pool. Extremely disappointed in the performance of the device when it worked, which was not that often. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: choose wisely
customer_reviews.text: this is a good cleaner, but the programming is bad and last century standard. there are cleaners for the same price by the same manufacturer with remote und app programming. their product line is extremely confusing. the cleaning is challenging. you have to take out an nearly empty bag ( the indicator lits up every other day ) and its no fun to clean it. the support is unhelpful.
customer_reviews.author: peter bartos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect cleaner for red Georgia clay in the pool! The silt filters have been lifesavers on our new construction pool. Cleans waterline and steps perfectly. As far as the weight, my five year old can lift it out of the pool. He struggles, but can still manage it.
customer_reviews.author: BizzyMom

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall happy. It does not work great on rounded floor to wall buy good enough. Have a few issues with the baskets, show full after an hour and has never been full. Great to have three basket choices but realistically can be a pain to change out, one even requires adding and removing a piece with a screwdriver. don't see a real advantage of this one over next step down.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am 64 and my husband is 70, we have no problem using this and it has saved hours of scrubbing. We still have to scrub the top tiles and some of the harder to reach places. That takes about 10 minutes. Well worth what we paid.
customer_reviews.author: Carleen Pattajo

customer_reviews.title: BY FAR THE BEST POOL PRODUCT WE HAVE EVER PURCHASED
customer_reviews.text: BUY ONE YOU WILL NOT BE SORRY. A WONDERFUL ROBOT THAT CLEANS OUR POOL UNTIL IT IS IMMACULATE! WE LOVE OUR DOLPHIN. WE PUT IT IN THE POOL ONCE OR TWICE A WEEK AND IT SCRUBS THE FLOOR, SIDES AND EVEN THE FIRST TWO STEPS OF OUR POOL. BEFORE WE SPENT HOURS EVERY WEEK MANUALLY BRUSHING THE BOTTOM AND SIDES OF THE POOL BUT THIS THING DOES ALL THAT AND CLIMBS UP ABOVE THE WATER LINE.
customer_reviews.author: Starzagazin

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to Buy
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I've used this a bunch of times before reviewing it. I must say it does exactly what it is supposed to do... Thoroughly clean the pool. I have a 20x40 free form and it has no hiccups. I really didn't know how the different cartridges and bag would help, but once I figured it out... They are great options to have (depending on whats on the floor of the pool). I've only had a Polaris cleaner (totally different) and I can't compare this to others, all I can is this one works great and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. S

customer_reviews.title: Great robot cleaner for indoor pools.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I finally gave in and got the Dolphin Premier robotic cleaner. I had been putting it off due to the price, but after a lot of research...I can honestly say I wish I would have bought it sooner. Very pleased with the filter/basket options. My pool is 20’ x 40’ and 8’ deep at one end. I use the bag filter after opening the pool for larger debris. And the 2 other cartridges for when I’m just doing a maintenance cleaning. Very pleased so far. Would also definitely get the caddy again...but would probably pass on the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey Todd Gold

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf Cleaner... None Better..
customer_reviews.text: I had an Older Dolphin Unit that Finally Quit after 12 Years... I shopped around for "Possible" other Replacement Units, And Nothing Came Close to the Dolphin's Features... I Bit the Bullet and got The Latest and Greatest Dolphin Premier... One Word. Awesome... This thing can suck a golf ball through a garden hose... It Climbs the Walls of my Gunnite Pool with Ease.. Almost to the point of cumming All of the Way Out of the Pool !! It Scrubs , Cleans , Sweeps ... It Does it all, Except Bring You a Cocktail... :(
customer_reviews.author: bob sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for a few months then totally stopped.
customer_reviews.text: This worked amazing for the first year. Unfortunately now it won’t move...it powers on but that’s all. Everything’s been cleaned, there’s no damage or items stuck in the baskets or propeller. Not worth the price for a few months of use 3-4 days a week (pool is closed Sept - May).
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Best Pool Cleaner We’ve Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pool cleaner. We don’t have to worry about suction power of our pool filter. It’s quiet, powerful and climbs walls - amazing! We call our Cleaner “Moe” because it reminds us of the little robot in Disney’s Wall-e. Purchased the holder (must have) but not the remote but it would be very handy... Next purchase? It’s learning capabilities are awesome. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane Jepsen

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Clean Well - Power Supply Failed At 30 days
customer_reviews.text: So...I loved my Aquabot Bravo...very reliable... But...when it was time to replace it...I thought I would try something new...I liked the debris collection system on the Dolphin (modular...screen plus bag)... Problem is that thisrobotic cleaner does not cover the entire pool area...somewhat random path that it takes leaves areas unaddressed on each cleaning cycle... Further...30 days into it...the power supply has failed...and I am *still* awaiting a replacement... Do not recommend you purchase this unit...
customer_reviews.author: maxq777

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well.
customer_reviews.text: It cleans the sides and bottom of the pool beautifully. But it doesn't do the stairs. Not a big deal. I just brush the dirt down to the bottom of the pool and the robot does the rest. There seems to be a lot of opinions out there as to the quality and dependability of this unit. I've only had it about 2 months and have had no problems
customer_reviews.author: qaz Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to understand with out instructions included in the box.
customer_reviews.text: wish it had better instructions to read and follow. Mostly you have to watch videos instead. a little more confusing to use. the old versions are easier to understand. Don't get me wrong it works but it's complicated.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Cassel

customer_reviews.title: It worked for one day. Now nothing!
customer_reviews.text: Sad, we thought we had found a super good way to clean our pool. It worked for 1 day and then nothing. Light is on, but nothing happens. Tried to reset, tried unplugging, cleaned, re cleaned, reset NOTHING!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Sackrider-Miller

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck on main drain. Doesnt handle corners very well.
customer_reviews.text: Does a pretty decent job picking up most of the stuff in the pool. Unfortunately, like some other reviews, ours would get stuck high centered on the main drain. If you don't check on it to pull it off the drain it just stays there. Completely defeats the point of having an automatic vacuum if you have to continually check on it. It also couldn't climb the curved corners in our deep end so those walls were never getting cleaned. Returning it to replace it with a new Polaris 9450 like we had before ordering this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the beginning of summer, we have been using it for 3.5 months now and it works great. We put it in once a week or so and it cleans the pool right up in just a couple hours. An amazing pool vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TRULY AWESOME!!! THIS IS THE BEST OPTION
customer_reviews.text: AFTER DEALING WITH SUB PAR POOL CLEANERS I TOOK A CHANCE ON THIS ONE. I AM GLAD I DID. NO PROBLEMS, WATER IS SUPER CLEAN AND WALLS OF POOL ARE ALGAE FREE. I TOOK A SAMPLE TO LESLIES POOL SUPPLY HERE IN SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA AND THEY SAID THE WATER IS 100% PERFECT AT ALL LEVELS. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: M. T

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed for $1,200
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this far I am very disappointed with our Dolphin Premier Maytronics pool vacuum. Every time we lift the vacuum out of the pool all of the debris that was vacuumed is released back into the pool. In addition we can not get the blue tooth remote control option to connect with mine, or my husbands iPhones. I have had no luck with getting in touch with customer service, on hold for hours today. For almost $1,200 I expect a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McClory

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy to get running and my pool looks awesome after just one treatment
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive the pool cleaner I hooked it up the same day it arrived and turned it on! The next day my wife and I could not believe how clean and beautiful the pool looked in the direct sunlight. we had just come out of winter and I was not looking forward to scrubbing the sides of the pebble tec, It was super easy to clean as well, I plan on using the cleaner at least once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best swimming pool cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love our Dolphin! This is our third one we have owned. Two with a previous pool and i bought this one for our new home. It cleans so well and keeps our pool sparkling clean. I would definitely recommend it and it is so easy to use. I actually named our “Dolphino”! 😃
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: ... model of a Dolphin pool vacuume and really were happy with it
customer_reviews.text: We had a previous model of a Dolphin pool vacuume and really were happy with it, so decided to buy another one. Works perfectly, but I wish there was a setting for it to run multiple times throughout the day. Our old dolphin ran every time the pool pump was running. The most this can run is once a day, but I will say maybe that is all we needed, because our pool was super clean...every day.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Wuzniak

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: Climbing rings only lasted 4 months. These are not covered under warranty and cost $40 dollars to replace. Had I known this I would not have made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JASON STOGNER

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a pool needs this product. We have a self cleaning pool and this product is a great asset to to compliment any pool. Will Never have another pool without this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerramy D. Icenhower

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner ever.
customer_reviews.text: I had a different high end pool cleaner for many years that finaly gave up the ghost. The Dolphin Premier is much better than the old one. It is faster and much more thorough. The old one seemed to get stuck in either the deep and or the shallow end and leave the rest uncleaned. The Dolphing gets the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has difficulty cleaning my pool with free-form rounded gunite ...
customer_reviews.text: It has difficulty cleaning my pool with free-form rounded gunite walls. If the walls are rounded toward the pool the cleaner will not climb the wall. It also fails to clean my swimouts. The program that controls the cleaner seems to be very random and often gets stuck in a loop cleaning the same walls and pool bottom based on the wall shape.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Smith

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Product and Garbage Service
customer_reviews.text: This unit was shipped to me defective. I pulled it out of the box, set it up, and when I plugged it in, all the lights flickered and turned off. I have called Maytronics to get it replaced, and so far three different times they have told me a replacement part was getting shipped next day air, only to find out the following day that they never did it. Garbage products and service.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: I finally have a pool sweep that works, BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a pool sweep that works, BUT, with design flaws. Of course weight, noticeably glossed over in the videos, is one issue and of course bulk. As a gadget designer in the industry I understand these difficult issues but now that's the task at hand.
customer_reviews.author: DuGo2Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We were skeptical because we have always had a Polaris in the pool, cleaning continually. The robot cleans great when you put it in the pool. Only issue is retraining yourself to make sure you are sticking it in the pool to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: Mothers little helper
customer_reviews.text: So far it's a great helper for keeping the pool clean. No problem going over drains..as the owner of several other brands cleaners..so far this is the easiest to use..clean and take out of pool..more info when I have to get it serviced..
customer_reviews.author: K. McKee

customer_reviews.title: Will not clean the steps or the sitting bench. ...
customer_reviews.text: Will not clean the steps or the sitting bench. Seems to move to quickly to clean up after a shocking of pool. Just puts a cloud back into the water. All in all it is nothing what i expected. Alot of money for no results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: It came exactly as expected and was incredibly easy to get started right away. It has completely eliminated our need for a hose and manual pool vacuum. The different types of filters make this very versatile and handy for all types of cleaning including spring and fall when a lot of larger debris fall into the pool. Depending on the design of your stairs in and out of the pool, it may or may not work well. So don't get your hopes up for the stairs but the cleaning of sidewalls and up at the waters level edge cleaning is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This dolphin does an excellent job!! The floor of the pool is totally clean, no slick spots. It also climbs the walls and cleans above the water line. I set it for two hours and walk away. Removing and cleaning the filter is simple. I clean it after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Dolphin premier robotic pool cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit that it cleans better then any other pool vacuum I have had, I have had it only five days and the lights on the supply controller has stop lighting up. Fifth day and no lights to tell me what I’m running one hr or three
customer_reviews.author: Sharrene

customer_reviews.title: Misses areas
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 x 40' in ground pool and have used these water vacuum cleaners for years. This one, I like everything about it except it misses spots on the pool floor.
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth the expensive price tag!
customer_reviews.text: With a newly-installed sand filter and pump, it still would not climb the walls. It would leave dirt and leaves on the floor of the pool having just vacumn in that location. It was a royal P.I.A. to open up to clean the filter bag. Gave it a week then decided to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M Herwig

customer_reviews.title: wrong parts in the box.
customer_reviews.text: the product came with a 3 prong plug for a 4 part connection. Because of this I could not use the vacuum. This was supposed to be a brand new vacuum, not sure how it happened. Had to send it back,
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Operator.....
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our dolphin “Big Hank” for about 1 month and so far it has met our expectations. I can put him in the morning before work and come home to a nice clean pool. Big Hank is a smooth operator, climbing and cleaning the walls & bottom of our pool. As new homeowners/pool owners, we are definitely thankful we took a chance on Big Hank, he’s helped keep our pool crystal clear. He’s definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: bluesky_in 7211

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, cleans very well and was able to pick up all my leaves from under the pool. I haven’t seen this machine get stuck once yet, compare to my old Polaris was no competition. One thing I don’t like about this machine is that it doesn’t work well on stairs, well at least for me. Overall, is a great piece of machinery.
customer_reviews.author: Ming

customer_reviews.title: this is the best.
customer_reviews.text: After owning a few pools and trying other brands, this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: randy a davis

customer_reviews.title: SUPER DEVICE FOR THE LAZIEST POOL OWNERS...
customer_reviews.text: First time pool owner who couldn't imagine pool maintenance of our inground saltwater pool without the Dolphin Premier. It's amazing! Definitely worth purchasing the caddy and remote package too. Don't use the remote for much more than guiding to the edge of the pool after its cleaning cycle; however, I much prefer that to pulling on the power cable!
customer_reviews.author: AnDrewC

customer_reviews.title: Electric, electric, electric.
customer_reviews.text: Had Polaris for years, this thing is sooooo much better. Not only does it clean the sides and bottom better there are no booster pumps and suction hoses to mess with. Electric is definitely the way to go. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: coppertop

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this cleaner because I was fed up with the Polaris I had breaking every year, getting stuck on steps, and doing a woefully inadequate job of cleaning. This Dolphin is a little pricey but to coin a phrase "you get what you pay for". I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and far better than the Aquabot Viva I am replacing
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and far better than the Aquabot Viva I am replacing. Comes with three variations of bags, 1 bag for leaves, disposable filters and what I use mostly quick cleaning screens. Features non taggle cord, easy cleaning debris collection system. Efficient logic to drive the cleaning cycle. Far more advanced than Aquabot for the same money. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: does not climb walls like in video
customer_reviews.text: does not work as advertised,very disappointing performance, will not climb walls in deep end of pool, vacuum slots to small on bottom big debris get stuck. water line cleaning is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: covcat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a week now and love it! I have a lot of trees by my pool and manually cleaning it was no fun. The dolphin picked up every leaf and twig in 1 cleaning cycle, the filter was easy to clean and the large leaf bag will be great for fall when the leaves really start dropping
customer_reviews.author: brian lusk

customer_reviews.title: You have to unplug and plug it in too often
customer_reviews.text: This works great when it works. I have to hard reset mine every third or fourth time I use it by unplugging it and plugging it back in. I'd spend the extra money and get one with a remote or better switch to control it. I bought mine and of summer 2018 and have had problems resetting it from the start. I wish I would have sent it back
customer_reviews.author: frank m

customer_reviews.title: even after holding and draining water but well worth the excellent clean. Cleans the side walls
customer_reviews.text: 30,000 gallon pool. Cleans the entire pool completely in three hours. A little heavy when removing out of the pool, even after holding and draining water but well worth the excellent clean. Cleans the side walls, 3 of 4 steps into the pool, bottom drain area, etc.. I would recommend purchasing the Dolphin Cart for easy handling!
customer_reviews.author: Uplander

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted but it didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: After less than six months the motor quit working. The serial number on the power supply is not the serial number of the cleaner and when I tried to register the cleaner for warranty service I was rewarded with "This Serial Not Exists In Our Database". The real serial number is on the inside of the unit. Spend the extra money and get one that is reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Randall

customer_reviews.title: works like a champ!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how this would be as it was $1097 (pool store wanted $1500 for the same exact model), but it works GREAT!! it sure beats using a vacuum. it cleans the bottom and the pools sides, its almost fun to just watch. I have not used the remote control, I set the timer for twice a week to clean the pool and so far it has been working for me.
customer_reviews.author: cherie

customer_reviews.title: Good product, delivered very fast.
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner was delivered very fast. Box was in perfect condition. The cleaner is very nice. Does a good job so far. Very happy but I should be for the price. So far the cleaner is meeting my expectations. Does not climb the stairs and is sporatic on water line cleaning but I hope it gets better the more it learns my pool. It's fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Arrived and Ran 3 seconds
customer_reviews.text: We just received our robot a couple of hours ago. It will only run 3 seconds and stops! We are returning it tomorrow. We have had two other robots in the past and this has never happened!
customer_reviews.author: BJM

product_meta.title: Dolphin Premier Robotic Pool Cleaner with Powerful Dual Scrubbing Brushes and Multiple Filter Options, Ideal for In-ground Swimming Pools up to 50 Feet.
feature_bullets: Drop and go. Easy to use, single button plug and play in-ground robotic pool cleaner ideal for pools up to 50 feet; backed by a 3 year quality assurance.
CleverClean delivers a smart and efficient clean using advanced algorithms for complete pool coverage. Anti-tangle patented swivel cable allows your Dolphin to move around your pool with ease.
Powerful, dual scrubbing brushes forcefully attack tough dirt and debris leaving your swimming pool floor, walls and waterline exceptionally clean in 3 hours.

Multiple filter options for an optimal clean pool. The Premier comes standard with three filter options: bottom-load fine cartridge filters, ultra-fine cartridge filters, and an oversized fine filter bag.

Cleaning made convenient. Set the Premier’s weekly scheduler to automatically clean for you- every day, every other day, or every 3rd day. The full filter indicator lets you know when it’s time to clean your filter.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars720 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
